attributes.action: Document the arguments for staying in vs leaving the EU. Send it to each voter
attributes.additional_details: The arguments have turned into a political mud slinging match.  The referendum is about the will of the people not the will of parliament or the will of individual politicians.  Everyone has an equal vote.  The mud slinging and manipulation of the media and civil service has to stop as politicians are clearly demonstrating how disconnected they are with the electorate.  Issue a document clearly stating the arguments for in vs out by the end of March and issue it to every household in the UK
attributes.background: Politicians of all parties have failed to appreciate that the referendum is about the people and not about the political establishment.  Objective arguments are not bring made and the public is being mislead on the real issues which are not being clearly stated.
